dr.inference.operators
Class LNVarianceOperator

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.inference.operators.AbstractCoercableOperator
          dr.inference.operators.ScaleOperator
              dr.inference.operators.LNVarianceOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoercableMCMCOperator, MCMCOperator
public class LNVarianceOperator
extends ScaleOperator

This operator acts on the S parameter of the LogNormalDistribution but corrects the M parameter so that the mean of the distribution is unchanged.

Version:
$Id: LNVarianceOperator.java,v 1.1 2004/12/16 14:17:21 alexei Exp $
Author:
Alexei Drummond
